title: Revolutionizing electrochemical CO2 reduction to deeply reduced products on non-Cu-based electrocatalysts
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01301H, Review Article
Haoming Yu, Hsiwen Wu, Yuen-Leong Chow, Jun Wang, Jie Zhang
Producing deeply reduced (net transferred electrons per carbon atom greater than two, > 2e-) products from electrochemical CO2 reduction reaction (eCO2RR) is an attractive and sustainable approach for CO2 utilization....
